Multi-Task Context-Dependent Behavior

Usage

Prerequisites for Using the Project

  1. Navigate to the Project Directory named multitask-context-dependent-behavior

cd path/to/multitask-context-dependent-behavior

  1. Activate the Conda Environment

conda activate mtcdb

Once the environment is activated, the project’s scripts and modules can be run safely.

Example:

python scripts/<script_name>.py

  1. After the end of a session, deactivate the environment to return to the base environment

conda deactivate

Note

Operating within the project directory ensures that relative paths in codes and configuration files correctly point to other resources within the project. Activating the virtual environment dedicated to the project ensures that any Python execution use the Python interpreter and dependencies required for the project.
